rows:
Some variation expected if training in parallel and on variety of hardware.
Check within tolerance.

Weights are so different that model
predictions are very different.

Training is getting stuck in local minima. A variety of training schema and
hyper parameters and optimizers should be tried.

As model’s code is version controlled, also version control model’s
performance so that performance results don’t get mixed up.

This is to be expected within some tolerance. Just as model code is
version controlled, train/val/test datasets should be version controlled.
Works for me, but not for you
Environment needs to be version controlled! (Packages and versions)
